import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' function ProductScreen({ }) { const { id } = useParams(); // <-- id is string const product = products.find(p => String(p._id) === id); // <-- convert `p._id` to string return (
Indietro

{product.name}

{product.name}
) } export default ProductScreen
